title: ‘Succession’ S3, E3 Precap
description:
Chris and Wos recap Episode 2 of 'Succession' Season 3. They discuss Kendall’s plan, Greg’s nervousness, donuts, Shiv’s role, and what to expect going into Episode 3 of Season 3 of 'Succession.' 

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Wosny Lambre
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
